episodeMeta.title: 완벽한 아이
episodeMeta.coreQuestion: 완벽해야 한다는 기대가 나를 어디까지 몰아붙일까?

nodes.text_ko: 아침 햇살이 교문을 비추고, 소연은 조용히 학교로 들어선다.
nodes.text_en: The morning sunlight shines on the school gate as Soyeon quietly enters.
nodes.text_ja: 朝の日差しが校門を照らし、ソヨンは静かに学校へ入る。
nodes.background_prompt_en: School entrance with sunlight casting long shadows, empty walkway, no people visible.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: School gate, sunlight, clean pavement, no characters, no readable text.

nodes.text_ko: 복도를 걸으며 소연은 벽에 붙은 공지문을 스쳐본다.
nodes.text_en: Walking down the hallway, Soyeon glances at a notice posted on the wall.
nodes.text_ja: 廊下を歩きながら、ソヨンは壁に貼られた掲示をちらりと見る。
nodes.background_prompt_en: School hallway with lockers and a notice board, paper posted but text unreadable.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Female student in uniform walking, gaze directed toward the wall, posture upright.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon walking past a notice board with blank paper, no readable text.

nodes.text_ko: 최다은: 소연아, 오늘도 일찍 왔네?
nodes.text_en: Choi Daeun: Soyeon, you're early again today?
nodes.text_ja: チェ・ダウン：ソヨン、今日も早いね？
nodes.background_prompt_en: School hallway with lockers, morning light through windows.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Two female students in uniform, one facing the other, one with hand raised in greeting.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon and Daeun in the hallway, Daeun's hand lifted as if greeting.

nodes.text_ko: 한소연: 그냥 습관이야. 오늘 발표 준비했어?
nodes.text_en: Han Soyeon: It's just a habit. Did you prepare for today's presentation?
nodes.text_ja: ハン・ソヨン：ただの習慣だよ。今日の発表、準備した？
nodes.background_prompt_en: School hallway with classroom doors, morning light.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Soyeon holding a folder, Daeun listening, both standing near classroom door.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon holding a folder, Daeun looking attentive.

nodes.text_ko: 최다은: 네가 있으면 든든하지. 다들 기대하는 것 같아.
nodes.text_en: Choi Daeun: It's reassuring to have you. Everyone seems to expect a lot.
nodes.text_ja: チェ・ダウン：ソヨンがいれば心強いよ。みんな期待してるみたい。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Empty classroom with desks and chairs, sunlight through windows.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Two students standing near the front row, Soyeon holding a folder, Daeun with hands clasped.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon and Daeun near classroom desks, Soyeon holding a folder.

nodes.text_ko: 책상 위에 오늘 발표 순서가 적힌 종이가 놓여 있다.
nodes.text_en: A sheet listing today's presentation order lies on the desk.
nodes.text_ja: 机の上に今日の発表順が書かれた紙が置かれている。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Classroom desk with a blank sheet of paper, no readable text, sunlight on surface.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Desk with a blank paper sheet, no characters, no readable text.

nodes.text_ko: 김하준: 소연아, 네가 첫 번째야. 긴장 안 돼?
nodes.text_en: Kim Hajun: Soyeon, you're first. Aren't you nervous?
nodes.text_ja: キム・ハジュン：ソヨン、君が一番だよ。緊張しないの？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Classroom with desks, morning light, presentation sheet on front desk.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Soyeon standing near a desk, Hajun facing her, one hand in pocket.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon and Hajun near a desk with a blank paper sheet.

nodes.text_ko: 한소연: 괜찮아. 연습 많이 했으니까.
nodes.text_en: Han Soyeon: It's fine. I practiced a lot.
nodes.text_ja: ハン・ソヨン：大丈夫。たくさん練習したから。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Classroom with sunlight, desks arranged neatly, presentation sheet visible.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Soyeon standing upright, Hajun listening, both near the front desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon and Hajun near the front desk, Soyeon holding a folder.

nodes.text_ko: 교실 시계가 8시 50분을 가리키고 있다.
nodes.text_en: The classroom clock shows 8:50.
nodes.text_ja: 教室の時計が8時50分を指している。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Classroom interior with a wall clock showing 8:50, desks and chairs in view.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Wall clock in classroom showing 8:50, no characters, no readable text.

nodes.text_ko: 서준호: 모두 자리 앉으세요. 곧 발표 시작합니다.
nodes.text_en: Seo Junho: Everyone, take your seats. The presentations will begin soon.
nodes.text_ja: ソ・ジュノ：みなさん、席についてください。まもなく発表を始めます。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Classroom with teacher's desk at the front, sunlight through windows.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Male teacher in formal attire standing at the front, hand raised to signal attention.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Seo Junho at the front of the classroom, hand raised.

nodes.text_ko: A) 소연은 발표 자료가 담긴 USB를 손에 쥔다. / B) 소연은 발표 자료가 담긴 USB를 손에 쥔다. / C) 소연은 발표 자료가 담긴 USB를 손에 쥔다.
nodes.text_en: A) Soyeon grips the USB containing her presentation. / B) Soyeon grips the USB containing her presentation. / C) Soyeon grips the USB containing her presentation.
nodes.text_ja: A) ソヨンは発表資料が入ったUSBを握る。 / B) ソヨンは発表資料が入ったUSBを握る。 / C) ソヨンは発表資料が入ったUSBを握る。

nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Soyeon holding a USB drive above a desk with blank paper.

nodes.text_ko: A) 발표 직전, 소연의 USB가 갑자기 인식되지 않는다. / B) 발표 직전, 소연의 USB가 갑자기 인식되지 않는다. / C) 발표 직전, 소연의 USB가 갑자기 인식되지 않는다.
